Tucson nodds to Perceptor with a smile of appreciation.

"Thank you Percept=
or, of course, you're welcome to assist me and I could always use some advi=
ce."

He opens the channel to Windlord and Kup.

"Permission granted Windlo=
rd and Kup. Rest easy my friends."

He first shows Perceptor his work room,=
 which has remained untouched for many vorns.  Yet everything was in perfec=
t place, and in perfect order.

" It hasn't been used in a long time, so if=
 anything appears unkempt, I do appologize."

Straight Shot enters the room=
, knowing exactly where everything is.

"Are you kidding me Tucson? This wo=
rkroom is spotless. Now, if you want unkempt, ya should've been around Whee=
ljack's lab, now that was unkempt."

Tucson chuckles.

" I can't disagree w=
ith you on that. Now, let's see what we'll need. Tucson to Ramulus, over.  =
I need to know exactly what types of tools you'll be needing to repair our =
medics.  I'm in my work lab now, assembling everything you'll need.  Also, =
if there are any materials you need I'll see about them as well.  And if yo=
u could, bring up their specifications on the computer, I'd like to be as p=
recise as I can if I'm going to restore them to their original stats."

Str=
aight Shot glances back to Tucson.

" You'll need a pair of eyes to work wi=
th you, the specs aren't readable without optic functions."

He nodds.
